text: Emmanuel Farhi (September 8, 1978 â€“ July 23, 2020) was a French economist. He was a professor of economics at Harvard University., Bio. His research focused on macroeconomics and finance. He was a member of the French Economic Analysis Council to the French Prime Minister from 2010 to 2012., CAE. Farhi died on July 23, 2020 at the age of 41. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French economists Category:Harvard University faculty
